createCommands:
mkdir ai-app && cd ai-app && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate && pip install openai flask && echo "from flask import Flask; app=Flask(__name__); @app.route('/')
def home(): return 'AI App Ready'; app.run()" > app.py && python app.py
quickstart:
1. Run the create command
2. Activate venv: source venv/bin/activate
3. Run: python app.py
4. Access at http://localhost:5000

copyBlocks.create:
mkdir ai-app && cd ai-app && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate && pip install openai flask && echo "from flask import Flask; app=Flask(__name__); @app.route('/')
def home(): return 'AI App Ready'; app.run()" > app.py && python app.py
copyBlocks.run: cd ai-app && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py
